title: Healing Luke
description: She Can't Escape Her Past...Occupational therapist Abby Stanford is on vacation alone, haunted by sharp memories of her fiances betrayal, her self-confidence shattered. Romance is the last thing on Abby's mind - until she meets the brooding and enigmatic Luke...He Won't Face His Future...Scarred by a horrific accident, former heartthrob Luke Morgan is certain his best days are behind him. Spunky and attractive, Abby knows how to help him recover, but Luke is sure his powerful attraction to her will only serve as a harsh reminder to him of the man he used to be.Abby is Luke's first glimmer of hope since the accident, but can she heal his heart before Luke breaks hers?
author: Beth Cornelison
